      • run

        public void run()
         throws MPIException
        Main program loop on the Master Node. This method waits for slave nodes to return completed frames. The method also calls a function to aggregate the data and write it to file
        Parameters:
        frames - Number of simulation frames
        Throws:
        MPIException

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        A RawFrame object containing the aggregated array
